project.name: Bebop
project.description: Seamless and efficient crypto trading for everyone
project.longDescription: Bebop is a trading app and a suite of APIs that finds the best route for your trades. It provides quick, secure trading for any tokens in any size at the best prices. The platform offers advanced features like USD value input, customizable slippage, and the ability to receive tokens in a different wallet.

features.title: Best Route Finding
features.description: Automatically finds and executes trades through the most efficient paths

features.title: Advanced Trading Features
features.description: USD value input, customizable slippage, and split wallet receiving

features.title: Quick Actions
features.description: Shortcuts menu for common trading operations and settings

project.currentStatus: Live on MegaETH testnet with full trading functionality

steps.title: Connect Your Wallet
steps.content: Visit https://bebop.xyz/trade?network=megaeth and connect your wallet. Make sure to set the network to MegaETH testnet.

steps.title: Select Trading Pairs
steps.content: Choose the tokens you want to trade from the available options. You can input either token amounts or USD values to specify your trade.

steps.title: Using Quick Actions
steps.content: Access the 'Shortcuts' menu to perform common actions quickly. This includes adjusting settings and executing frequent trading patterns.

images.alt: Bebop shortcuts menu showing quick actions

steps.title: Customize Your Trade
steps.content:
Fine-tune your trading parameters:
• Adjust slippage tolerance to control price impact
• Set a different receiving wallet address if desired
• Review the trade details and estimated output

steps.title: Execute Your Trade
steps.content: Once you're satisfied with the trade parameters and output estimates, click the trade button to execute your transaction. Make sure you have enough tokens and gas for the trade.
